results.t: Fallout 4 System Requirements - Can I Run It?
results.p: To run the Fallout 4 system requirements on PC, you will need an NVIDIA GTX 550 Ti GPU, an Intel Core i5-2300 CPU, 8GB of RAM, and 30GB of HDD or SSD space.
